title: IIT Jammu Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 02 Project officer Posts
description: The Indian Institute of Technology Jammu (IIT Jammu) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Project Officer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech in Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the IIT Jammu Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible can...
